# ldesign-divider



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Divider 分割线组件
用于分隔不同内容区域

## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description | Type                            | Default        |
| -------------- | --------------- | ----------- | ------------------------------- | -------------- |
| `dashed`       | `dashed`        | 是否虚线        | `boolean`                       | `false`        |
| `direction`    | `direction`     | 分割线方向       | `"horizontal" \| "vertical"`    | `'horizontal'` |
| `text`         | `text`          | 文字内容        | `string`                        | `undefined`    |
| `textPosition` | `text-position` | 文字位置        | `"center" \| "left" \| "right"` | `'center'`     |


----------------------------------------------

*Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)*
